longDescription: A classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil. This pizza features a thin, crispy crust that is hand-tossed and baked to perfection.
shortDescription: Classic pizza with mozzarella and basil.

longDescription: A refreshing salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing. The crispness of the lettuce paired with the creamy, tangy dressing creates a perfect balance of flavors.
shortDescription: Crunchy salad with romaine and croutons.

longDescription: Delicious sushi rolls filled with fresh fish, vegetables, and seasoned rice. Each roll is expertly crafted with the finest ingredients, ensuring a burst of flavor in every bite.
shortDescription: Fresh sushi rolls with fish and veggies.

longDescription: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce. The combination of savory flavors and textures creates a satisfying meal thatâ€™s hard to resist.
shortDescription: Classic cheeseburger with all the fixings.

longDescription: Creamy fettuccine pasta tossed in Alfredo sauce and topped with Parmesan cheese. This indulgent dish is rich and comforting, perfect for those who enjoy a creamy texture and savory flavor.
Soft or crispy tortillas filled with seasoned meat, lettuce, and cheese. This popular Mexican dish can be customized with a variety of toppings such as salsa, guacamole, or sour cream.
shortDescription: Tasty tacos with your choice of filling.

longDescription: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting. This decadent dessert is perfect for any occasion, from birthdays to celebrations.
shortDescription: Decadent chocolate cake for dessert lovers.

longDescription: Stir-fried rice with vegetables, eggs, and your choice of protein. This Asian-inspired dish is a favorite for its savory flavors and hearty texture.
shortDescription: Savory fried rice with mixed veggies.

longDescription: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with lemon and herbs. This healthy dish is packed with omega-3 fatty acids and flavor.
A refreshing blend of fruits, yogurt, and a touch of honey. This smoothie is not only delicious but also packed with vitamins and nutrients.
